#head -h	[head]
#grep	-p	[grep]
#headocker -h -p	[docker run -i -v #{projectroot}:#{projectroot} -w #{projectroot} rdocker head]
#headchroot -h -p	[chroot #{projectroot} head]
cmd -u	[docker run --rm --net none -v #{csaroot}:#{csaroot}:ro -v #{cacheroot}:#{cacheroot}:ro -w #{projectroot} -i nextcode/bioconductor]
cmdserver -u	[docker run --rm --net none -v #{csaroot}:#{csaroot}:ro -v #{cacheroot}:#{cacheroot}:ro -w #{projectroot} -i nextcode/bioconductor]
Rdocker -u	[docker run --rm --net none -v #{csaroot}:#{csaroot}:ro -v #{cacheroot}:#{cacheroot}:ro -w #{projectroot} -i nextcode/bioconductor Rscript]
python -u	[python]
Rscript -u	[Rscript]
head	[head]
cmdpythonpass -u	[python ../tests/scripts/pass.py]
